heading: Notice
text:
The commissioner shall serve a notice of hearing with regard to the proposed nuisance abatement on the owner
and mortgagee of record of the building or premises and other persons having a recorded interest in the property in the manne r
provided in article 212 of chapter 2 of this title for the service of an order of closure. If the sign is under the control of an outdoor
advertising company and an address for such company is reasonably ascertainable, the notice shall also be served on such outdoor
advertising company by mail to the last known address for such company or, if such company is registered in accordance with
section 28-502.2, at the address provided to the department by the registrant.
